name: Path to Master Chef
description: Begin your journey to become the ultimate chef!
Create various dishes and master cooking skills.

dialogs.start: Welcome to the world of cooking! Do you wish to become a master?
dialogs.basics: First, you must be able to perfectly create basic dishes.
dialogs.advanced: Now it's time to challenge more difficult recipes.
dialogs.contest: Prove your skills in the cooking contest!
dialogs.complete: Congratulations! You are now a Master Chef!
